Text:
thank you very much for the upload..
plz do her new album.. Traveller

Now that we are only allowed to download magnet links, what if I DON'T WANT all five of these albums?  Can anyone tell me how to DEselect one or more of them?  Magnet links appear to be an all-or-nothing deal.
Wait, I figured it out. You have to start the transfer, pause it the moment all the metadata is there, and then deselect what you don't want.

Now that I've downloaded it I have to say this is an outstanding torrent. All the metadata are in place; I was able to simply drop all 5 cds into iTunes with virtually no typing. The mp3 used is superb: high-quality audio in extremely compact files.  And my God, the music is AMAZING. Her interplay with Vishwa Mohan Bhatt on RISE is stunning. Thank you, primusmaximus, for a perfect upload.
